name: Dangerous 4x4 Mountain Drive: Snow Way Tracks
name_original: Dangerous 4x4 Mountain Drive: Snow Way Tracks
description:
Fasten your seat belts and get ready to drive the extreme super cars, heavy duty 4x4 jeeps and high end SUVs on dangerous mountainous and hilly tracks in Dangerous 4x4 Mountain Drive: Snow Way Tracks. This will be the most exciting and challenging off-road safari drive experience you have ever faced!
In Dangerous 4x4 Mountain Drive: Snow Way Tracks you have to showcase your driving skills on the most dangerous and risky hilly off-road tracks with amazing Rocky Mountains, stunning sceneries and magnificent waterfalls. These tracks are not for the regular drivers but for the riders who love the xtreme sports and ready to accept the impossible. There are multiple fascinating vehicles to select to and showcase the unique driving skills. Unlock the new tracks and cars as you progress and complete the addictive missions. In your garage there are sports cars, off-road jeeps, high end SUVs to select and ready to rock and roll.
So the wait is over for the off-road drivers and download Dangerous 4x4 Mountain Drive: Snow Way Tracks and enjoy the extreme driving on extreme tracks along with extreme weather conditions. Ready to dare the impossible!
Game Features:
1) Stunning graphics and environments
2) Multiple extreme super cars
3) Entertaining and Addictive Off-road levels
